scripts.test: npm run test:tier0 && npm run test:tier1:smoke
scripts.test:tier0: node --test tests/test-app-logic.mjs && node --test tests/test-i18n.mjs && node tests/test-ocr-latex-postprocess.mjs
scripts.test:tier1: node tests/test-main-flow.mjs && node tests/render-known-good.mjs --mode verify --suite all
scripts.test:tier1:smoke: node tests/test-main-flow.mjs && node tests/render-known-good.mjs --mode verify --suite smoke
scripts.test:all: npm run test:tier0 && npm run test:tier1
